channel.title: SpammerS! I Need Help Here!
channel.description: Ok I have a wierd source with no working ::ipban command or ip bann dont work how do i manually ipban or get rid of the Spammers with the syipkpker?

item.title: SpammerS! I Need Help Here!
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“iKolli`, post:4, topic:257807”][code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3 ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“Player successfully IP banned”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
 }
  }

}
[/code][/quote] IP BAN HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE COMMAND!

Read full topic

item.title: SpammerS! I Need Help Here!
item.dc:creator: @klorox klorox
item.description:
@klorox wrote:

[quote=“Bubbsy7, post:2, topic:257807”]Ip ban doesn’t work unless you really got a good source, Modscape has working ip ban though…[/quote] IP ban doesn’t work unless someone adds it -.-. And towards pwner, there are lots of tuts if you’ll just look around.

Read full topic

item.title: SpammerS! I Need Help Here!
item.dc:creator: @iKolli iKolli`
item.description:
@iKolli wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3 ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“Player successfully IP banned”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
 }
  }

}
[/code]
